definitions: a bloodsucking horsefly that attacks humans and other large mammals. It can transmit various diseases, including tularemia.

notes.text: Genus Chrysops, family Tabanidae: several species, including C. callidus, widespread throughout North America

shortDefinitions: bloodsucking horsefly that attacks humans and other large mammals

definitions: a bloodsucking louse fly that is a parasite of deer. It loses its wings on finding a host, and the female gives birth to fully grown larvae.
shortDefinitions: bloodsucking louse fly that is parasite of deer
